Author: snefferu
Text: Update, I had a handful of almonds, 2 after eights and a funsize toblerone for my morning snack:) it probably doesn’t sound like much to most normal people but I know those reading this will get it and understand how it feels when your throat feels like it’s constricted to the width of a straw, and how easy it is to sit and mope and eat nothing. that was about an hour ago, it’s too close to lunch to eat again now because i want to be able to finish my lunch. But I’m drinking another “full fat” coke so I think I’m doing really well. My friend is coming over after lunch for a chat and I’m feeling a little better
